p: Identification of plant material was carried out using a stereomicroscope with the aid of literature data (Bolòs and Vigo, 1995; Laguna et al., 1998; López, 2001; Reales et al., 2004; Serra, 2007; Sáez, 2010; Mateo and Crespo, 2014). A voucher of each sample was deposited in the Herbarium BCF of the University of Barcelona (Barcelona, Spain) (Table 1).
